lines.text:
[to Lauri]
You just listen to me, Miss Innocent. There's nothing friendly between two females. There never was. There never will be.
Sorry you feel that way. I was hoping we could help each other.
You don't need help - neither do I. Not as long as we have two men around us.
the birthplace of life, the great storehouse of minerals, the prison of haunting mysteries.
We are now prepared to invade the black wilderness.
No frontier was ever explored by just one expedition.
I know you're disappointed that Tom couldn't make it, but I just couldn't get him to come up. He asked me to give you this.
Well I hope he knows what he's doing,
[removes Tom's ring and throws it overboard]
I don't know about you guys, but I'm ready for a two inch steak!
